Package net.silthus.schat.eventbus

Interface EventBus

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
public interface EventBus extends AutoCloseable
The sChat event bus.

Used to subscribe (or "listen") to sChat events.

Since:
1.0.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Closes the event bus unsubscribing all event handlers freeing up resource locks.
    static EventBus
    empty()
    Creates a new empty event bus instance.

  • Method Details

    • empty

      static EventBus empty()
      Creates a new empty event bus instance.
      Returns:
      the new empty event bus
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • eventBus

      static EventBus eventBus()
      Creates a new event bus instance.

      Make sure to free up the event bus calling close().

      Returns:
      the created event bus
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • eventBus

      static EventBus eventBus(boolean debug)
      Creates a new event bus that is optionally logging all interactions.
      Parameters:
      debug - true to log all calls to the bus
      Returns:
      the created event bus
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • post

      <E extends SChatEvent> E post(@NonNull E event)
      Posts a new event to the event bus informing all subscribers about the event.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to post
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • on

      @NonNull <E extends SChatEvent> @NonNull EventSubscription<E> on(@NonNull @NonNull Class<E> eventClass, @NonNull @NonNull Consumer<? super E> handler)
      Registers a new subscription to the given event.

      The returned EventSubscription instance encapsulates the subscription state. It has methods which can be used to terminate the subscription, or view stats about the nature of the subscription.

      Type Parameters:
      E - the event class
      Parameters:
      eventClass - the event class
      handler - the event handler
      Returns:
      an event handler instance representing this subscription
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • register

      @NonNull @NonNull @Unmodifiable Set<EventSubscription<?>> register(Object listener)
      Registers all methods of the given listener annotated with Subscribe as event handlers.

      All event handler methods must have a single parameter, being the event they want to subscribe to.

      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to search for events
      Returns:
      a list of registered event subscriptions
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • subscriptions

      @NonNull <E extends SChatEvent> @NonNull @Unmodifiable Set<EventSubscription<E>> subscriptions(@NonNull @NonNull Class<E> eventClass)
      Gets a set of all registered handlers for a given event.
      Type Parameters:
      E - the event class
      Parameters:
      eventClass - the event to find handlers for
      Returns:
      an immutable set of event handlers
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • close

      void close()
      Closes the event bus unsubscribing all event handlers freeing up resource locks.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Since:
      1.0.0
